abstract: Mark Dennis González Hoffmann (born 10 July 1984), commonly known as Mark González, is a Chilean footballer whose preferred position is as a left winger. González currently plays for Universidad Católica.He made his international debut in 2003, and was selected in Chile's squads for two Copa America tournaments and the 2010 World Cup.
